Ders Dağıtım Programı
  • Config Modülü
  • Sayfa kaynağını görüntüle

Config Modülü

Bu modül, yapılandırma yönetimini sağlar.

Config Loader

Configuration loader with validation Loads configuration from YAML files and validates against schema

class config.config_loader.ConfigLoader(config_path: str | None = None)[kaynak]

Bases: object

Loads and validates scheduler configuration

__init__(config_path: str | None = None)[kaynak]
load_config() → Dict[str, Any][kaynak]

Load and validate configuration from file

Dönüşler:

Configuration dictionary if valid, default config if validation fails

get_config_value(key_path: str, default: Any = None) → Any[kaynak]

Get a specific configuration value using dot notation

Parametreler:

  • key_path – Path to the config value using dot notation (e.g. ‘algorithms.hybrid_optimal.enabled’)

  • default – Default value if the key doesn’t exist

Dönüşler:

Configuration value or default

save_config(config: Dict[str, Any], path: str | None = None) → bool[kaynak]

Save configuration to file

Parametreler:

  • config – Configuration dictionary to save

  • path – Path to save to (defaults to config_path)

Dönüşler:

True if successful, False otherwise

reload_config() → Dict[str, Any][kaynak]

Reload the configuration from file

Dönüşler:

Configuration dictionary

config.config_loader.get_config() → Dict[str, Any][kaynak]

Get the global configuration

Dönüşler:

Configuration dictionary

config.config_loader.get_config_value(key_path: str, default: Any = None) → Any[kaynak]

Get a specific configuration value using dot notation

Parametreler:

  • key_path – Path to the config value using dot notation

  • default – Default value if the key doesn’t exist

Dönüşler:

Configuration value or default

Kullanım Örnekleri

Yapılandırma Yükleme

from config.config_loader import ConfigLoader

# Config yükle
config = ConfigLoader("config/scheduler_config.yaml")

# Değer al
max_iterations = config.get("algorithms.ultra_aggressive.max_iterations")
print(f"Max iterations: {max_iterations}")

Yapılandırma Değiştirme

# Değer değiştir
config.set("algorithms.ultra_aggressive.max_iterations", 2000)

# Kaydet
config.save()

Global Config Kullanımı

from config.config_loader import get_config

# Global config instance
config = get_config()

# Kullan
log_level = config.get("logging.level", "INFO")
